Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Class YaegerEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.YaegerEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Activatable, Anchorable, Bounded, NodeProvider, Placeable, Removeable, Rotatable, SceneChild, Initializable, DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RectangleEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity
    public abstract class YaegerEntity
extends Object
implements Initializable, Activatable, TimerListProvider, Bounded, Removeable, Placeable, SceneChild, NodeProvider, Rotatable
    A YaegerEntity can be used to display anything that is a child of a Node.
